Entry.JapaneseText: でも本当にこのまま、この人たちを村に 連れて帰っても、大丈夫なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you really think that taking these people back to the village is going to go over well?

Entry.JapaneseText: 時間はかかるかもしれないが、説得しよう。
Entry.EnglishText: It may take time, but let's try to persuade them.

Entry.JapaneseText: それがムダなら、力ずくでも 言う事を聞かせるってか？
Entry.EnglishText: And if that doesn't work, are we going to have to force them to do what we say?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、力で人の心までは変えられない。 人の心を動かすのは、心でしかあり得ない。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, brute force won't be changing any hearts. <Italic>Only</Italic> the heart can move people.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもよぉ……やっぱり年寄りを 村の外に放り出す連中なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: But... Those guys <Italic>did</Italic> kick these old folks out of the village...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの憤りはわかっている…… だがあくまでも冷静にな。
Entry.EnglishText: I understand your anger...but you need to remain level-headed.
